item.description:
Hot Digity Dogs and Pigs....

Ok since i seen 2 listings...same, but 2 listings..it reminds me of the Dualing Banjo scene from my favourite scary movie on the river..
(always watch out for them back woods river fishermen with no teeth and no cloths on, there is something wrong with them) while kayaking out there..

or behind the bushes at your party....



Anyway..
Im not really into the 100+ party crowd...heck it might be super fun with lots of beautiful active intelligent ladies for the guys and hot sausage guys for the ladies, all available and ready just looking for love....free flowing booze..oh yeh things could get really fun on such a warm night under the blanket viewing the sparkeling eyes and stars.....Well then The Pig Roast in Ellington is the place for you to go..
But....I have to resist all that temptation....its hard..oh its so painful not to go and partake in such delights...

But with 100+ if you say the wrong name in the dark to your partner..it could get you into trouble with who is next to you......

So Here it is,
We were thinking of doing a much much scaled down event..
Pork Loin, other dishes, and only a little wine..not getting out of hand here..or into others hands here....well...
thats TBD...LOL

What other way to celebrate two dualing pig roasts..?
Well dualing banjo's and the movie Dilliverance out against the wall..
It will have ya squeeling.......

Ok the details:
Im not squeeling them just yet.....

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: I See 2 Pig Roast Listings ??? Sounds like a DILLIVERANCE event to me
